external_references.description: Symantec Security Response. (2018, July 25). Leafminer: New Espionage Campaigns Targeting Middle Eastern Regions. Retrieved August 28, 2018.

objects.description: [Leafminer](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0077) has obtained and used tools such as [LaZagne](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0349), [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002), [PsExec](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0029), and [MailSniper](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0413).(Citation: Symantec Leafminer July 2018)
